column2: ## Now let's do the logistic regression ----------------------------------------
glm1 <- glm(formula = sent ~ trust, data = d, family = binomial(link = "logit"))

glm(formula = sent ~ trust, family = binomial(link = "logit"), 
    data = d)
Null deviance: 1028.6  on 741  degrees of freedom
Residual deviance: 1021.1  on 740  degrees of freedom
# Use exp function to get the odds ratio and confinit for CI - use cbind to

summary(glm2) # not exactly the same results but close:

glm(formula = sent ~ trust + zAfro + attract + maturity + zfWHR + 
    glasses + tattoos, family = binomial(link = "logit"), data = d)
Null deviance: 1028.63  on 741  degrees of freedom
Residual deviance:  987.05  on 734  degrees of freedom
#               afro IS supposed to be significant
#             - note: we do not care for significance persay
#                     this note is only here to show that we
